name: Battle Decks (itch)
description: Battle Decks is a classic turn based strategy game with a twist, the player controls a party of units, all with their own unique names, races and classes. The player must take these units through an ever changing battlefield fighting through varying amounts of enemies, each with their own skills and abilities. What happens is determined via a deck of cards that can either lead to a shop, where the player can use gold to upgrade their heros abilities, a new hero will appear joining the fight with their party members, finally there is a battle card, that will lead the player into a battlefield with a random number of enemies on the level to fight.
